If all pillows disappeared, one could rest their head comfortably while sleeping by using a rolled-up towel or blanket to provide support and cushioning.
Another option would be to use a neck pillow, which would provide support and comfort to the neck and head while sleeping.
One could also try using a memory foam pillow, which would conform to the shape of the head and neck for optimal comfort and support.
For those who prefer a more natural approach, a stack of books or a block of wood could be used as a makeshift pillow to rest the head on while sleeping.
Finally, one could try using a foam roller or massage ball to massage the neck and shoulders before bed, which could help to relax the muscles and make it easier to fall asleep without a pillow.
